title: Ariana Grande Rumored To Cover Céline Dion In 'Beauty And The Beast' Soundtrack - moviepilot.com
text:
Ariana Grande Rumored To Cover Céline Dion In 'Beauty And The Beast' Soundtrack January 11, 2017 at 06:30AM By Heather Snowden , writer at Ariana Grande [Credit: Instagram @arianagrande] By Heather Snowden , writer at Creators.co Staff Writer at MP. Lover of bad puns, nostalgic feels and all things Winona. 
Anyone who watched Ariana Grande's on point impression of Céline Dion on Jimmy Fallon's The Tonight Show back in 2015 has been waiting for this moment, the moment that someone finally appreciates her ability to whack out a warble that's on par with the Québécois queen enough to give her a platform to prove it to the rest of the world. And prove it she will have to do, for that platform just happens to be the upcoming #BeautyandtheBeast live-action reboot. 
Back in 1991 when OG Beauty and the Beast 's dancing teacups and talking closets were awing children around the globe, Céline Dion and Peabo Bryson shimmied behind the mic to belt out one of the most iconic theme songs in #Disney history — you know the one — and, if the rumor mill* is to be believed, it's those big song boots that #ArianaGrande will have to fill. But we're sure she'll have no trouble doing so, Grande may be tiny but those lungs pack a huge punch!
